weekly_top_story.headline: Israel Prepares Gaza City Invasion Amid Ongoing Conflict and Hostage Crisis
weekly_top_story.summary: Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu announced plans to take over Gaza City, calling up tens of thousands of reservists and rejoining talks with Hamas to release hostages, signaling a critical phase in the Israel-Gaza conflict with broad regional and humanitarian implications.

stories.headline: Microsoft Employees Protest Company’s Work with Israeli Military at Washington HQ
stories.summary: Eighteen people were arrested during a protest at Microsoft’s headquarters, organized by workers opposing the company’s AI and cloud technology support for the Israeli military in Gaza, highlighting corporate activism intersecting with international conflict concerns.
